You come up upon a badger. He seems to be stuck in a hole.
This will be a story about Intelligence.
BLAAAH BLAAAAAAH! Your alarm is going off. It\'s the first day of high school. You lazily reach over and...
turn it off. You start getting ready for school.
hit the snooze button and go back to sleep.
turn it off and go back to sleep.
